summary.body: There are frequent requests on this site for people to carry out repairs, decorate etc.  Yesterday I used the Barbican handyman and can recommend him. He returned my call promptly, turned up punctually and fixed the problem for the agreed price. He is also keen to preserve original Barbican features rather than doing simpler replacements. His website is   which shows the services he offers as well as a transparent pricing policy. He can also be phoned on 07857 633148
